analyzed: milindapañha
anumāna pañha
nippa pañca vagga
khīṇāsava sati sammosa pañha
bhante nāgasena atthi arahato sati sammoso ti

original: “Vigatasatisammosā kho, mahārāja, arahanto, natthi arahantānaṁ satisammoso”ti.
analyzed: vigata sati sammosā kho mahā rāja arahantaḥ natthi arahantānam sati sammosā ti
āpajjeyya pana bhante arahā āpattinti
āma mahārāja ati
kismin vatthusmin ti

original: “Kuṭikāre, mahārāja, sañcaritte, vikāle kālasaññāya, pavārite appavāritasaññāya, anatiritte atirittasaññāyā”ti.
analyzed: kuṭikāre mahā rāja sañcaritte vikāle kāla saññāya pavārite appavārita saññāya anatiritte atiritta saññāya ati
bhante nāgasena tumhe bhaṇatha

original: ‘ye āpattiṁ āpajjanti, te dvīhi kāraṇehi āpajjanti anādariyena vā ajānanena vā’ti.
analyzed: ye āpattim āpajjanti te dvīhi kāraṇehi āpajjanti anādariyena vā a jānanena vā ati

original: Api nu kho, bhante, arahato anādariyaṁ hoti, yaṁ arahā āpattiṁ āpajjatī”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho bhante arahataḥ anādariyam hoti yam arahā āpattim āpajjati iti
na hi mahā rājāti

original: “Yadi, bhante nāgasena, arahā āpattiṁ āpajjati, natthi ca arahato anādariyaṁ, tena hi atthi arahato satisammoso”ti?
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena arahā āpattim āpajjati natthi ca arahato tena hi atthi arahato sati sammoso ti

original: “Natthi, mahārāja, arahato satisammoso, āpattiñca arahā āpajjatī”ti.
analyzed: natthi mahā rāja arahato sati sammosaḥ āpattiñca arahā āpajjati iti

original: “Tena hi, bhante, kāraṇena maṁ saññāpehi, kiṁ tattha kāraṇan”ti?
analyzed: tena hi bhante kāraṇena mam saññāpehi kim tattha kāraṇanti
dve me mahā rāja kilesāḥ loka vajjam paṇṇatti vajjam ca ati
katama mahā rāja
dasa akusala kamma pathāḥ idam vuccati lokavajja
katamam

original: Yaṁ loke atthi samaṇānaṁ ananucchavikaṁ ananulomikaṁ, gihīnaṁ anavajjaṁ.
analyzed: yam loke atthi samaṇānam an anucchavikam an ānulomika gihīnam an avajja

original: Tattha bhagavā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññapeti ‘yāvajīvaṁ anatikkamanīyan’ti.
analyzed: tattha bhagavā sāvakānam sikkhāpadam paññapeti yāvajīvam an atikkamanīya

original: Vikālabhojanaṁ, mahārāja, lokassa anavajjaṁ, taṁ jinasāsane vajjaṁ.
analyzed: vikālabhojana mahā rāja lokassa anavajja tam jina sāsane vajja

original: Bhūtagāmavikopanaṁ, mahārāja, lokassa anavajjaṁ, taṁ jinasāsane vajjaṁ.
analyzed: bhūta gāma vikopana mahā rāja lokassa anavajja tam jina sāsane vajja

original: Udake hassadhammaṁ, mahārāja, lokassa anavajjaṁ, taṁ jinasāsane vajjaṁ.
analyzed: udake mahā rāja lokassa anavajja tam jina sāsane vajja

original: Iti evarūpāni evarūpāni, mahārāja, jinasāsane vajjāni, idaṁ vuccati paṇṇattivajjaṁ.
analyzed: iti evarūpāni evarūpāni mahā rāja jina sāsane vajjāni idam vuccati paṇṇatti vajja
loka vajjam abhabbaḥ khīṇāsavaḥ tam ajjhācaritu

original: Yaṁ kilesaṁ paṇṇattivajjaṁ, taṁ ajānanto āpajjeyya.
analyzed: yam kilesam paṇṇatti vajja tam a jānantaḥ āpajjeyya

original: Avisayo, mahārāja, ekaccassa arahato sabbaṁ jānituṁ, na hi tassa balaṁ atthi sabbaṁ jānituṁ.
analyzed: avisayaḥ mahā rāja ekaccassa arahataḥ sabbam jānitu na hi tassa balam atthi sabbam jānitu

original: Anaññātaṁ, mahārāja, arahato itthipurisānaṁ nāmampi gottampi, maggopi tassa mahiyā anaññāto;
analyzed: anaññāta mahā rāja arahataḥ itthi purisānam nāmam pi gottam pi maggaḥ pi tassa mahiyā anaññātaḥ
vimuttiyā iva mahā rāja ekaccaḥ arahā jāneyya
chaḍ abhiññaḥ arahā saka visayam jāneyya
sabbaññū mahā rāja tathāgataḥ uva sabbam jānāti iti
sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti
khīṇāsava sati sammosa pañho tatiyo
